name: Heatmap Clustering
description: Order rows and columns of a heatmap based on their similarities, using a hierarchical clustering algorithm.

properties.name: scale
properties.description: A logical value indicating whether the variables should be scaled to have unit variance before the analysis takes place.

properties.name: center
properties.description: A logical value indicating whether the variables should be shifted to be zero centered.

properties.name: method
properties.description: A value specifying the clustering method to be used (see hclust R function).

properties.name: metric
properties.description: A value specifying the metric to be used (see hclust R function).

properties.name: fill
properties.description: Value with which to fill in structural missings.
